full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN SGROL MA DKAR MO LAM MCHOD CING GSOL BA GDAB TSUL TSE YI DNGOS GRUB MCHOG STZOL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DZA GAL CHE BA'I SKABS ZHIG LAG LEN 'DI LTA BU BLUNG NA RANG BZHIN MANG PO LA'ANG PHAN PAR BSAM TE, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' DRIN KHO NAS 'TSO BA'I GTZUG GZUGS BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG GDUGS DKAR SKYABS KYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO'I YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
